name: Giant Eagle
languages: Giant Eagle, understands but can't speak Common and Auran

actions.name: Talons
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d6+2) slashing damage and the target is grappled (escape DC 13). Until this grapple ends  the giant eagle can't attack a different target with its talons.

special_abilities.name: Keen Sight
special_abilities.desc: The eagle has advantage on Perception checks that rely on sight.
